rxbsp.HEDER: RADIO X-CEIVER ADMINISTRATION BTS STATUS DATA

OPCONDMAP.F1: MO is degraded or not operational due to internal TRXC fault.
OPCONDMAP.F2: MO is degraded or not operational due to SW upgrade.
OPCONDMAP.F3: MO is degraded or not operational due to synchronization problems.
OPCONDMAP.F4: MO is degraded or not operational due to frame synchronization problems.
OPCONDMAP.F5: MO is degraded or not operational due to communication loss detected for CS traffic.
OPCONDMAP.F6: MO is degraded or not operational due to communication loss detected for PS traffic.
OPCONDMAP.F7: MO is degraded or not operational due to diversity error.
OPCONDMAP.F8: MO is degraded or not operational due to RX path imbalance.
OPCONDMAP.F9: MO is degraded or not operational due to TX maximum power deviation.
